manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MRSUNKI Flat Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set, help you make clean up quickly and easily. Focusing on clean and dirty separation, while advocating for water conservation, it ensures efficient cleaning work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I/we have been using this for almost 2 months now and we like it 👍 It works great on linoleum and that's what we use it for. So, happy with purchase and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mop part works well if youre wiping walls or something similar. The bucket part is not efficient in any way shape or form. But most importantly the mop because of how many little bar pieces it has to extend or shorten it (and honestly it's still so short my 16 year old, under 5' daughter complains that she has to bend over half way to accomplish anything.) Because of how the handle goes together the pieces pinch when you're mopping, they pinched so bad that the first time I used it it made me bleed. This was with my hand on the "handle" portion of the mop. Definitely do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy. Functional.effective mopping. All floor types.This is very handy cleaning setup. Very convenient when you have to work around the house, as you can take the bucket anywhere you had like. The mechanism works smoothly where you can rinse the dust off of mop surface , which makes cleaning more efficient. The mop length is enough for comfortable use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I don't know if it is good or not?
reviews.reviewText: When I got the mop and bucket package it didn't appeared to be sealed properly though it was sealed. Before I even opened it, it appeared I might have received a previous purchased item? It appeared that way. As I opened it the way it was packaged it again appeared like it was sealed like a brand new item? It had smudges on the bucket like it had been handled and the plastic packaging was all cut open? I find it hard to believe it would have came from the factory packed as it was. I took it out but I didn't assemble the mop or anything because I was shocked how cheap thin plastic the buck device was and so many complicated moving parts. The mop handle was suck skinny think piping, not sturdy at all, that I didn't even bother to assemble the mop. The instructions were picture like diagrams with very little word instructions to go along with it. I just couldn't accept this merchandise. The only thing that looked good about it was the 4 pads and even they weren't in a sealed bag, just thrown in there. I repackaged everything and I sealed the plastic bags and I really sealed off the box opening, where it wasn't done like it should have been coming from a manufacture. I didn't feel I was getting a new product, never touched by a purchasers hands before me. I refuse to pay that much money for items that aren't brand new from the manufacturer and what manufacturer would ship their merchandise so unprotected including the box openings? Somebody had opened this box and examined the merchandise before I got it and it was lucky things hadn't fallen out of the box before I got it. Based on how cheaply the bucket and mop were made it wasn't worth my money or time to see if it worked. I felt it better to return it not using any of it at all. The problem with online purchasing is that you don't know what you are getting before you get it. This is why there are so many returned items to online stores. Amazon is nice because they have never failed me for returned items. This is why I have a Prime membership and have the confidence I can return items that aren't up to expectations. This product has good reviews. It might have been good for me but I just couldn't deal with how the boxing and item appeared after I got it. It looked too fragile and might break after the 30 days? I just couldn't deal with it. It might be a really good mop and bucket system? I will never know. If I had seen it in a brick&mortar store I wouldn't have bought it, especially for the price. It just looked like and felt like cheap merchandise made in China.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean the wood floor with flat mop
reviews.reviewText: We were using round mop to clean our home wooden floor and this flat mop really helps to clean fully and able to visualize it. The bucket storage bin is helpful in the cleaning process to rinse in the water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only half the pad can be rinsed. The bucket tips over because u can only put a little water on the top section so when u try to put the mop in it just falls over and leaks everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Pads connection to the head needs work.
reviews.reviewText: The idea of this mop is very good. It has the same issue that all the other mops like this have. It has three little plastic tabs that fit into pockets on the pad. Over time these plastic tabs bend and the pads do not stay in place. This causes the pad not to slide into the bucket, making the whole mop useless. If you could buy replacement head or even the red plastic part that the pad's connect to it would be an easy fix to make the mop usable again. I was hoping this version was better but it is not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad to have this new mop. It looks just like the pictures and easy to assemble. It comes with instructions too!
